## kl vpn restart

restart vpn device

### Synopsis

```
This command let you restart vpn device.
Example:
  # restart vpn device
  kl vpn restart
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help      help for restart
  -v, --verbose   show verbose
  -h, --help   help for restart
```
